meanings.sent1: She has an exaggerative way of telling stories.
meanings.sent2: His exaggerative claims made it hard to believe him.
meanings.sent3: The exaggerative fisherman claimed he caught a whale in a pond.
meanings.sent4: Her exaggerative gestures made her seem like a cartoon character.
meanings.sent5: The exaggerative description of the storm made it sound like a hurricane.

meanings.sent1: The movie's exaggerative scenes were entertaining.
meanings.sent2: The book was full of exaggerative language to create drama.
meanings.sent3: The exaggerative cake was so tall it touched the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: His exaggerative smile lit up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The exaggerative painting seemed to come to life with its vibrant colors.
